messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm *BACK* and *DEBUGGED* :D
messages.msgSnippet: I just got a free copy of InoculateIT personal edition which has found and removed my kak file.  I hope that s sorted it.  We shall see... Tracy
messages.messageBody:
I just got a free copy of InoculateIT 'personal edition' which has found and removed my kak file.  I hope that's sorted it.  We shall see...
 
Tracy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm *BACK* and *DEBUGGED* :D
messages.msgSnippet: Pris, I know this sounds crazy, but you re one of the lucky ones. In order for me to get rid of the kak virus I had to completly wipe out everything from my
messages.messageBody:
Pris,
I know this sounds crazy, but you're one of the lucky ones. In order for me
to get rid of the kak virus I had to completly wipe out everything from my
computer and start all over. I lost everything: ( Talk about being a
computer junkie, when my poor brother (whose help I enlisted to help)
finally taped into my email I had 2200 unread messages....and that was only
from 10 days! Please let me know when your 12 step program starts, I'll be
there. <G>.
Amy
----- Original Message -----
From: Pris <x_t_sipr@...>
To: Unschooling-dotcom <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 25, 2000 7:25 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm *BACK* and *DEBUGGED* :D


> goodness, this has been a LONG 72 hrs but I'm GLAD TO SAY, I'm finally RID
> of the kakworm.virus ... our phone bill is going to be OUT OF THIS WORLD
> next month b/c I was on the phone off/on for *4* hrs w/ my ds (away @
> college) b/c he helped me to get rid of this thing ... *ACK*!!! I also
> realized how ADDICTED I've b/c to the internet ... I guess I'll be signing
> myself up for a 12~step computer~addiction~anoyn~group asap!!! seriously,
I
> was quite a pathetic basketcase OFFLINE :I
>
> Tracy, I'm sorry I didn't return your e-m but since I knew I had this
virus,
> I didn't want to spread it around by resending it ... besides, I don't
have
> the foggiest notion about *WHAT* my ds did nor would I EVER be able to
> explain the steps, either ... good luck if you've contracted this ... AND,
> my ds tells me another virus is due out June 1st but hopefully, I'll be ok
> ...
>
> thanks Shannon Brophy for trying to help me but, like I said, I had no
idea
> what you were trying to say and since I knew I was infected, I didn't want
> to spread it to you, too ... but, thanks so much ...
>
> ohhhhhhhhhhh, the joys of technology :}
> Pris ~> *BONK* ~> that ladies, is the sound of my head hitting my keyboard
> from UTTER EXHAUSTION :I
>
>
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm *BACK* and *DEBUGGED* :D
messages.msgSnippet: Well, good for you for getting debugged!  As I could figure out, (which I could have mentioned)  if one doesn t use the signature function (which despite
messages.messageBody:
Well, good for you for getting debugged!  As I could figure out, (which I could have mentioned)  if one doesn't use the signature function (which despite becoming more tech-y by the hour <g>) one isn't spreading it, at least, when I had the full-fledged version I didn't get told I was spreading it.  I almost think I should get re-infected so I could debug myself properly.  BTW, what did it do to your 'puter, apart from infecting others?
 
Tracy
----- Original Message -----
From: Pris
To: Unschooling-dotcom
Sent: Friday, May 26, 2000 3:25 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm *BACK* and *DEBUGGED* :D

goodness, this has been a LONG 72 hrs but I'm GLAD TO SAY, I'm finally RID
of the kakworm.virus ... our phone bill is going to be OUT OF THIS WORLD
next month b/c I was on the phone off/on for *4* hrs w/ my ds (away @
college) b/c he helped me to get rid of this thing ... *ACK*!!!  I also
realized how ADDICTED I've b/c to the internet ... I guess I'll be signing
myself up for a 12~step computer~addiction~anoyn~group asap!!!  seriously, I
was quite a pathetic basketcase OFFLINE :I

Tracy, I'm sorry I didn't return your e-m but since I knew I had this virus,
I didn't want to spread it around by resending it ... besides, I don't have
the foggiest notion about *WHAT* my ds did nor would I EVER be able to
explain the steps, either ... good luck if you've contracted this ... AND,
my ds tells me another virus is due out June 1st but hopefully, I'll be ok
...
